alert.note: Alert for Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 17 at 9:02PM EST until December 19 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM MONDAY TO 10 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 5 inches. * WHERE...In Pennsylvania, Higher Elevations of Indiana County. In West Virginia, Preston and Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston Counties. * WHEN...From 1 PM Monday to 10 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday evening and Tuesday morning commutes.

area.areaDesc: Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston
